name: bullet jumping
description:
mouse1 = revolver (50dmg)
mouse2 = shotgun (100dmg)
leftshift = jump with shotgun (think tf2 simplified force-a-nature)
space = jump

red things are shootable: 200hp

yellow things are "more ammo"

did not implement waits for animations or shootable ammo limits

example ideas:

machinegun = hover
explosive jumping

shotgun = as shown but with backwards momentum in the air, not just up
